p.k: It's been only two weeks since our visit to Bahrain, but the Mercedes-Benz Virtual GP 2018 season is back and this time it's Round 08 from Austin, USA, which is also the final race for Mercedes-Benz C9 1989 prototypes. And it was a proper farewell for those beasts. Big thanks to our amazing commentary team Justin Sutton (FakeGhostPirate) and Chris Buxton (KingKodiak).
